g.text: ✅ Key improvements: 50px row height, 30px buttons, status indicators, better spacing

✅ Enhanced features: Search, usage stats, timestamps, copy functionality, detailed status
✅ Organization features: Collapsible groups, view modes, sorting, group management
✅ Grid benefits: Fast scanning, usage indicators, efficient space use, clear hierarchy
Start with Concept 1 for immediate UX improvements, then iterate based on user needs
